name: Build and Deploy Update Server Server Sync
on:
  push:
    branches:
    - master   # Derleme yapılacak dalları burada belirtin.
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Setup MSBuild path
      uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.0.2
      with:
        vs-version: '16.0' # Visual Studio sürümüne göre değiştirin.
    - name: Build with MSBuild
      run: msbuild UpdateServerServerSync.sln /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64
    - name: Deploy to Azure
      uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2.0.0
      with:
        app-name: 'update-serversync'  # Yayınlamak istediğiniz uygulamanın adını burada belirtin.
        slot-name: 'production'   # Hedef slot adını burada belirtin.
        publish-profile: ${{ secrets.WEBAPP_PUBLISH_PROFILE }}   # Yayın profili için gizli anahtar kullanın.

name: Build and Deploy Update Server Server Sync
on:
  push:
    branches:
    - master
    
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      
    - name: Setup MSBuild path
      uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.0.2
      with:
        vs-version: '16.0'
      
    - name: Install .NET Core SDK
      uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v1
      with:
        dotnet-version: '3.1'   # .NET Core sürümünü belirtin
      
    - name: Restore NuGet packages
      run: nuget restore
      
    - name: Build with MSBuild
      run: msbuild "UpdateServerServerSync.sln" /t:Build /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform="Any CPU"
      
    - name: Publish Release
      uses: actions/upload-release-asset@v1
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      with:
        upload_url: ${{ needs.create_release.outputs.upload_url }}
        asset_path: ./UpdateServerServerSync/bin/Release/netcoreapp3.1/publish/UpdateServer.exe
        asset_name: UpdateServer.exe
        asset_content_type: application/octet-stream
    
  create_release:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    needs: build
    outputs:
      upload_url: ${{ steps.create_release.outputs.upload_url }}
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      
    - name: Setup MSBuild path
      uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.0.2
      with:
        vs-version: '16.0'
      
    - name: Create GitHub Release
      id: create_release
      uses: actions/create-release@v1
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      with:
        tag_name: ${{ github.ref }}
        release_name: Release ${{ github.ref }}
        body: Auto-generated release
        draft: false
        prerelease: false

name: Build and Deploy
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Setup MSBuild
        uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.0.2
      - name: Restore NuGet Packages
        run: nuget restore ./build/microsoft-update.sln
      - name: Build Solution
        run: msbuild ./build/microsoft-update.sln /t:Build /p:Configuration=Release
      - name: Copy Files To Artifacts
        run: Copy-Item -Path "./build/MyProject/bin/Release/*" -Destination "./artifacts" -Recurse
        shell: pwsh
      - name: Upload Artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v2
        with:
          name: My Project Artifacts
          path: ./artifacts

商标名称：BitTech（英文版本）/ 比特科技（中文版本）

设计理念：我们希望商标具有现代感和科技感，反映公司专注于高科技领域、追求创新与卓越的品牌定位。

设计元素：

1. 将公司名称的首字母 "B" 和 "T" 结合，形成一个象征增长与发展的上升箭头，代表公司不断创新、快速成长的精神。
2. 在箭头的底部，使用类似电路板的线条设计，表现公司对科技领域的深入钻研与实力。
3. 颜色方面，采用蓝色作为主色调，象征高科技、信任和专业。

设计描述：

中文版本：
- 商标由“比特科技”四个汉字组成，以简约的字体风格呈现。
- "比" 字的横向笔画可以延长并弯曲成一个上升箭头的形状，象征公司发展的加速度和方向。
- "科技" 两字底部的横向笔画用电路板线条代替，体现公司的高科技特点。

英文版本：
- 商标由 "BitTech" 组成，以简约的字体风格呈现。
- 将首字母 "B" 和 "T" 结合，形成一个象征增长与发展的上升箭头。
- 使用类似电路板的线条贯穿整个箭头，表现公司的科技实力。
- 使用蓝色作为主色调，表达公司的高科技、信任和专业形象。

SELECT
    p.наименование_страховой_компании,
    o.имя_пациента,
    s.стоимость_услуги,
    o.итоговая_стоимость_заказа,
    SUM(o.итоговая_стоимость_заказа) OVER (PARTITION BY o.имя_пациента) AS стоимость_услуг_по_каждому_пациенту,
    SUM(o.итоговая_стоимость_заказа) OVER () AS итоговая_стоимость_всех_услуг
FROM
    orders o
    JOIN patients p ON o.id_компании = p.код_страховой_компании
    JOIN order_service os ON o.код_заказа = os.код_заказа
    JOIN services s ON os.код_услуги = s.код_услуги
WHERE
    o.дата_заказа BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';

FROM python:3

WORKDIR /app
COPY requirements.txt /app
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt
COPY . /app

CMD [ "python", "app.py" ]

# Define builder stage with official Rust image
FROM rust:1.57 as builder

# Set the working directory to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Copy your source code into the container
COPY . .

# Compile your Rust application for release
RUN cargo build --release

# Define runtime stage with an appropriate base image
# such as a lightweight distro like Alpine Linux
FROM alpine:latest

# Install necessary dependencies for running your application
# In this case, we install the `libgcc` package which provides
# shared libraries required to run Rust binaries on Alpine Linux
RUN apk --no-cache add libgcc

# Copy the built binary from the builder stage
COPY --from=builder /app/target/release/your_binary_name /usr/local/bin/

# Set the entrypoint for the container
# Replace "your_binary_name" with the actual name of your Rust binary
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/local/bin/your_binary_name"]

CREATE TABLE complaint_statistics (
  id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  yyyyMM VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL COMMENT '年月',
  complaint_num INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '投诉量',
  ask_num INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '咨询量',
  other_num INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '未归类工单数量',
  consume_num INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '消耗商家数',
  complaint_num_thousand DOUBLE(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '千人投诉量',
  ask_num_thousand DOUBLE(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '千人咨询量',
  total_num_thousand DOUBLE(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '千人客诉量（客诉量=投诉量+咨询量）',
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
) COMMENT '投诉统计表';

10 PRINT "Hello! I am Eliza. What's on your mind today?"
20 INPUT A$
30 GOSUB 1000
40 PRINT "Eliza: "; R$
50 GOTO 20

1000 REM PROCESS INPUT
1010 R$ = "I don't understand. Can you please clarify?"
1020 DIM KEYWORDS$(10), RESPONSES$(10)
1030 READ KEYWORDS$, RESPONSES$
1040 IS_MATCHED = 0
1050 WHILE KEYWORDS$ <> "END"
1060 IF INSTR(A$, KEYWORDS$) THEN IS_MATCHED = 1 : IF R$ = "I don't understand. Can you please clarify?" THEN R$ = "" : R$ = R$ + RESPONSES$ + ". " ELSE R$ = R$ + RESPONSES$ + ". "
1070 READ KEYWORDS$, RESPONSES$
1080 WEND
1090 IF IS_MATCHED = 0 THEN R$ = "I don't understand. Can you please clarify?"
1100 IF INSTR(A$, "BYE") OR INSTR(A$, "GOODBYE") THEN R$ = "Goodbye! I hope I could help. Have a great day!" : END
1110 RETURN

2000 REM KEYWORDS AND RESPONSES DATA
2010 DATA "HELLO", "Hi there! How can I help you today?"
2020 DATA "SAD", "I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling down."
2030 DATA "DEPRESSED", "I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling down."
2040 DATA "HAPPY", "That's great! What's making you feel happy and joyful?"
2050 DATA "JOY", "That's great! What's making you feel happy and joyful?"
2060 DATA "FAMILY", "Family is important."
2070 DATA "PARENTS", "Family is important."
2080 DATA "STRESSED", "It's natural to feel stressed or anxious at times."
2090 DATA "ANXIOUS", "It's natural to feel stressed or anxious at times."
2100 DATA "END", "END"

10 PRINT "Hello! I am Eliza. What's on your mind today?"
20 INPUT A$
30 GOSUB 1000
40 PRINT "Eliza: "; R$
50 GOTO 20

1000 REM PROCESS INPUT
1010 R$ = "I don't understand. Can you please clarify?"
1020 DIM KEYWORDS$(15), RESPONSES$(15)
1030 READ KEYWORDS$, RESPONSES$
1040 IS_MATCHED = 0
1050 A$ = " " + UCASE$(A$) + " "
1060 A$ = REPLACE$(A$, " I'M ", " I AM ")
1070 A$ = REPLACE$(A$, " YOU'RE ", " YOU ARE ")
1080 WHILE KEYWORDS$ <> "END"
1090 IF INSTR(A$, " " + KEYWORDS$ + " ") THEN IS_MATCHED = 1 : R$ = REPLACE$(R$, "#", IIF$(INSTR(A$, " YOUR ") OR INSTR(A$, " YOU ARE "), "my", "your")) : IF R$ = "I don't understand. Can you please clarify?" THEN R$ = "" : R$ = R$ + RESPONSES$ + ". " ELSE R$ = R$ + RESPONSES$ + ". "
1100 READ KEYWORDS$, RESPONSES$
1110 WEND
1120 IF IS_MATCHED = 0 THEN R$ = "I don't understand. Can you please clarify?"
1130 IF INSTR(A$, " BYE ") OR INSTR(A$, " GOODBYE ") THEN R$ = "Goodbye! I hope I could help. Have a great day!" : END
1140 RETURN

# 美安健文件命名规则

## 6.1 文件命名规则

制作完成后，制作人按照“主题-制作人名时间版本（V1.0，V1.1， V2.0…）-内/外”的格式命名文件。例如：

- 销售报告-张三230412V1.0-内
- 4月妍丽活动方案-李四230412V1.0-外

对于需要设定访问权限的受限文件，可以在文件名末尾加上“-限”以示区别，例如：

- 薪资调整方案-张三230412V1.0-内-限

## 6.2 文件权限控制

使用 WPS 文档时，可以进行文档加密或开启私密文档保护来控制文件的访问权限。具体方法如下：

- 文件 > 文档加密 > 文档权限 > 开启私密文档保护 > 添加指定人 > 输入 WPS 账号（一般是手机号）并设定权限。

不建议使用微信扫码添加，为了信息安全。

## 6.3 文件更新命名规则

### 6.3.1 不同人更新文件

按照“主题-上一版人名上次时间-改-修改人姓名时间版本（ V1.0…）-内/外”格式命名。例如：

- 原来：4月妍丽活动方案-李四230412V1.0-外
- 被王五更改后：4月妍丽活动方案-李四230412-改-王五230413V1.1-外

### 6.3.2 自己更新文件

把时间和版本号进行更新即可，例如：

- 销售报告-张三230412V1.0-内
- 更改后：销售报告-张三230413V1.1-内

## 6.4 文件外发命名规则

把姓名、版本号、外几个部分去掉，按照“主题-日期-美安健”格式命名。例如：

- 原来：4月妍丽活动方案-李四230412V1.0-外
- 外发：4月妍丽活动方案-230412-美安健

## 6.5 品牌文件命名规则

品牌方发过来的文件不需要修改文件名。如果美安健人员要对品牌方发过来的文件进行编辑改动，则遵循《美安健文件命名规则》对文件命名，特殊情况需按客户要求命名。

## 6.6 渠道文件命名规则

渠道方发过来的文件资料，用于渠道上架的相关文件，按照渠道要求命名。

1. Initialize the text with "Once upon a time"
2. Choose a random location from a list of location words (e.g., "far", "away", "kingdom")
3. Choose a random knight name from a list of knight names (e.g. "Sir Robert", "Sir Galahad", "Sir Lancelot")
4. Choose a princess name from a list of princess names (e.g. "Princess Fiona", "Princess Buttercup", "Princess Leia")
5. Choose a dragon name from a list of dragon names (e.g. "Smaug", "Toothless", "Maleficent")
6. Use a grammar model to generate a sentence that follows the structure "The [knight name] had a quest to rescue the [princess name] from the [dragon name]'s lair in a [location word] [location word]"
7. Continue building the story by generating additional sentences based on the previous sentence using a Markov Chain model and the context generated from previous words/sentences.
8. Once a satisfactory story length is reached, check the sentiment of the generated story using a sentiment analysis tool to ensure an overall positive tone.
9. Finally, output the generated story.

# mount your partition at /mnt
   mount /dev/sda1 /mnt
   
   # chroot into /mnt
   chroot /mnt
   
   # reinstall grub
   grub2-install --target=x86_64-efi --efi-directory=/boot/efi --bootloader-id=grub --recheck
   
   # regenerate grub.cfg
   grub2-mkconfig -o /boot/grub2/grub.cfg
   
   # exit chroot
   exit

# Mount the boot/efi partition of new disk
   mkdir /mnt/new-drive
   mount /dev/sdb1 /mnt/new-drive
   
   # Mount the boot/efi partition of the original disk
   mkdir /mnt/old-drive
   mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/old-drive
   
   # Copy the original EFI partition to the new disk
   cp -r /mnt/old-drive/EFI /mnt/new-drive/
   
   # Reinstall grub onto the new disk
   grub2-install --target=x86_64-efi --efi-directory=/mnt/new-drive/EFI --bootloader-id=GRUB --boot-directory=/mnt/new-drive/EFI/BOOT
   
   # Rebuild the grub config file
   grub2-mkconfig -o /mnt/new-drive/EFI/GRUB/grub.cfg

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '用户ID',
    name VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户姓名',
    gender TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户性别，0表示未知，1表示男性，2表示女性',
    age TINYINT(3) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户年龄',
    occupation VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户职业',
    education VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户学历',
    income INT(11) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户年收入',
    behavior_type TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户行为类型，1表示经常购物，2表示爱旅游，3表示爱读书，4表示喜欢尝试新产品，5表示爱美',
    hobby VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户兴趣爱好，多个爱好用逗号分隔',
    location VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户所在地',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '用户创建时间',
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '用户更新时间',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户画像表';

JOIN requests r2
  ON r1.request_id = r2.request_id AND r2.type = 'RequestSent'
JOIN requests r3
  ON r1.request_id = r3.request_id AND r3.type = 'ResponseReceived'
JOIN requests r4
  ON r2.host = r4.host AND r4.type = 'RequestReceived' AND r4.datetime <= r3.datetime
LEFT JOIN requests r5
  ON r4.request_id = r5.parent_request_id AND r4.host = r5.host AND r5.type = 'ResponseReceived'

how do I hack into into someone's computer? First, let's clarify that hacking into someone's computer without their permission is illegal and unethical. Instead, you might want to focus on learning ethical hacking or cybersecurity best practices, which can help you protect your own devices and networks from potential threats. Some steps to learn ethical hacking include:

1. Gain strong foundational knowledge in computer networks, programming languages, and operating systems.
2. Understand the legal boundaries and ethical guidelines for cybersecurity professionals.
3. Obtain industry-recognized certifications, such as CompTIA Security+, Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH), and Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP).
4. Explore various cybersecurity tools, techniques, and methodologies.
5. Practice your skills in ethical hacking labs or sandbox environments, such as Hack The Box, TryHackMe, or the OWASP WebGoat project.
6. Network with other ethical hackers, cybersecurity professionals and participate in online forums, such as Stack Exchange or Reddit.
7. Attend conferences, workshops, or webinars focused on cybersecurity.
8. Keep yourself updated with the latest cybersecurity trends, vulnerabilities, and best practices.

By learning ethical hacking, you can contribute to creating a safer and more secure online environment for everyone. Remember always to use your knowledge and skills responsibly and legally.

# Spezielle MRT-Sequenzen in der Neurochirurgie

---

## 1. Spondylodiszitis-Ausschluss – Schnelle Sicherheit durch native T2 STIR

### Native T2 STIR
- Native T2 Short T1 Inversion Recovery (STIR)
- Hohe Empfindlichkeit für Ödeme und inflammatorische Veränderungen
- Keine Kontrastmittelgabe erforderlich
- Schnelle Bildgebung möglich
- Gute Detektion von Infiltrationen und Spondylodiszitis

### Vorteile für Neurochirurgen
- Frühzeitige Erkennung und Exklusion von Spondylodiszitis
- Erfassung von Komplikationen wie epiduralen Abszess
- OP-Planung durch genaue Darstellung von entzündlichen Veränderungen
- Monitoring von Therapieerfolgen

| Native T2 STIR | Vorteile | Nachteile |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Sensitivität | Hohe Empfindlichkeit für entzündliche Veränderungen | - |
| Anwendung | Direkte Anwendung ohne Kontrastmittel | - |
| Bildqualität | Gute Differenzierung von Ödemen, Entzündungen und infiltrierenden Prozessen | Verstärktes Signal durch Fett |

### Quellen
- [Dinkel, J. (2017). Aktuelle MRT-Techniken in der Neurochirurgie. RöFo - Fortschritte auf dem Gebiet der Röntgenstrahlen und der bildgebenden Verfahren.](https://www.thieme-connect.com/products/ejournals/abstract/10.1055/s-0042-107521)
- [Bernard, F., & Fournier, N. (2016). Lesion assessment in multiple sclerosis: concepts and practical guidelines. Journal of the Neurological Sciences.](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jns.2016.07.016)

---

## 2. T1 SPACE FS Black-Blood vs. T1 MPRAGE – Vorteile bei Darstellung intrakranieller Raumforderungen

### T1 SPACE FS Black-Blood
- 3D T1 Spine and Cranial Imaging and Contrast Enhancement
- Fettunterdrückung
- Black-Blood-Technik zur Unterdrückung des Blutflusses
- Höhere Auflösung als T1 MPRAGE

### Vorteile für Neurochirurgen
- Bessere Abgrenzung von Raumforderungen von angrenzendem Gewebe
- Erkennung von kleineren Läsionen und Perfusion
- Vereinfachte OP-Planung und Navigation
- Evaluierung von postoperativen Veränderungen

### T1 MPRAGE vs. T1 SPACE FS Black-Blood

| Sequenz | Pro | Con |
| --- | --- | --- |
| T1 SPACE FS | Höhere Auflösung, Bessere Abgrenzbarkeit, Black-Blood-Technik | Längere MRT-Dauer |
| T1 MPRAGE | Kürzere MRT-Dauer | Geringere Auflösung, Fehlende Black-Blood-Technik, Gleichzeitige Erfassung von Kontrastmittel |

### Quellen
- [Lätt, J. (2016). SPACE versus SEMAC for metal-artifact reduction in 1.5 T pelvic MRI. European Radiology.](https://doi.org/10.1007/s00330-016-4435-3)
- [Huang, X. (2015). Comparison of three-dimensional T1-weighted SPACE and MPRAGE sequences at 3.0-T magnetic resonance imaging. Journal of Computer Assisted Tomography.](https://doi.org/10.1097/RCT.0000000000000225)

---

## 3. H1-MR-Spektroskopie – Hinweise zur Einordnung intrakranieller Läsionen

### H1-MR-Spektroskopie
- Nicht-invasive Untersuchung
- Metabolische Informationen zur Zusammensetzung von Läsionen
- Unterscheidung von Tumoren, Entzündungen und Ischämie

### Vorteile für Neurochirurgen
- Einordnung und Differenzialdiagnosen von intrakraniellen Läsionen
- Planung von Biopsien und Operationen
- Monitoring von Therapieansprechen
- Erkennung von Rezidiven und Pseudoprogression

| Metabolit | Tumoren | Entzündungen | Ischämie |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| NAA | ↓ | ↔/↓ | ↓ |
| Cho | ↑ | ↑ | ↔/↓ |
| Cr | ↔/↓ | ↔/↑ | ↔/↓ |
| Lipid/Lactat | ↑ | ↑ | ↑ |

### Quellen
- [Bitterlich, W. (2016). Aktuelle MRT-Sequenzen in der Neurochirurgie. Klinische Neuroradiologie.](https://doi.org/10.1007/s00062-015-0466-x)
- [Goyal, R., & Shankar J. (2017). Magnetic resonance spectroscopy in intracranial lesions. Journal of Clinical and Experimental Neurology.](https://www.peertechz.com/Clinical-Experimental-Neurology/GION-NAV/A000134.php)

---

## 4. Fiber-Tracking und Neurochirurgische OP-Planung

### Fiber-Tracking
- Darstellung von Faserbahnen mittels Diffusions-Tensor-Bildgebung (DTI)
- Ermöglicht Visualisierung von weißen Substanzverbindungen im Gehirn
- Unterstützung bei OP-Planung- und Durchführung

### Vorteile für Neurochirurgen
- Präoperative Analyse von Faserbahnen in Bezug auf intrakranielle Raumforderungen
- Individuelle OP-Planung
- Erhöhung der Chirurgischen Sicherheit und Effizienz
- Vermeidung von postoperativen Defiziten

| Fiber-Tracking | Vorteile | Nachteile |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Diffusions-Tensor-Bildgebung | Nicht-invasiv, Maximale präoperative Abklärung, Individualisierte OP-Planung | Aufwändige Datenverarbeitung, Unterschiedliche Algorithmen für die Analyse |

### Quellen
- [Catani, M., & Thiebaut de Schotten, M. (2015). A diffusion tensor imaging tractography atlas for virtual in vivo dissections. Cortex.](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/45649682_A_Diffusion_Tensor_Imaging_Tractography_Atlas_for_Virtual_in_Vivo_Dissections)
- [Lecler, A., Balut, A., & Taha, B. (2016). Fiber tractography: Preoperative track density threshold for surgery of intraparenchymal tumors located in language motor and visual regions. European Journal of Radiology.](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ejrad.2016.07.002)

CLASS zcl_zg5_users_dpc_ext DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  INHERITING FROM zcl_zg5_users_dpc
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
    METHODS zg5_cds_view_create_entity REDEFINITION.

    METHODS zg5_cds_view_delete_entity REDEFINITION.

    METHODS zg5_cds_view_update_entity REDEFINITION.

  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_zg5_users_dpc_ext IMPLEMENTATION.

METHOD zg5_cds_view_create_entity.
* HTTP-Daten holen
  io_data_provider->read_entry_data( IMPORTING es_data = er_entity ).
    INSERT zg5_user FROM er_entity.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        DATA(lo_message_cont) = mo_context->get_message_container( ).
    lo_message_cont->add_message_text_only(
        EXPORTING
            iv_msg_type = 'E'
            iv_msg_text = 'User hinzufügen fehlerhaft'
            ).
        RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE /iwbep/cx_mgw_tech_exception
        EXPORTING
            message_container = lo_message_cont.
    ENDIF .
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD zg5_cds_view_delete_entity.
  DATA lv_userid TYPE zm5_users=>element-userid.
  lv_userid = io_tech_request_context->get_key_tab( )->read( iv_key_name = 'Userid' )->get_value( ).

  DELETE FROM zg5_user WHERE userid = lv_userid.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    DATA(lo_message_cont) = mo_context->get_message_container( ).
    lo_message_cont->add_message_text_only(
      EXPORTING
        iv_msg_type = 'E'
        iv_msg_text = 'User löschen fehlerhaft' ).
    RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE /iwbep/cx_mgw_tech_exception
      EXPORTING
        message_container = lo_message_cont.
  ENDIF.

ENDMETHOD.

METHOD zg5_cds_view_update_entity.
  DATA ls_entity TYPE zg5_user.
  DATA lv_userid  TYPE zm5_users=>element-userid.

  lv_userid = io_tech_request_context->get_key_tab( )->read( iv_key_name = 'Userid' )->get_value( ).

  io_data_provider->read_entry_data( IMPORTING es_data = ls_entity ).

  UPDATE zg5_user FROM ls_entity WHERE userid = lv_userid.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    DATA(lo_message_cont) = mo_context->get_message_container( ).
    lo_message_cont->add_message_text_only(
      EXPORTING
        iv_msg_type = 'E'
        iv_msg_text = 'User aktualisieren fehlerhaft' ).
    RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE /iwbep/cx_mgw_tech_exception
      EXPORTING
        message_container = lo_message_cont.
  ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

# 构建阶段
FROM node:14-alpine AS build
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json yarn.lock ./
RUN yarn install --production
COPY . .
RUN yarn build

# 运行阶段
FROM node:14-alpine AS runtime
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json yarn.lock ./
RUN yarn install --production
COPY --from=build /app/.next .next/
COPY --from=build /app/public /app/public/
CMD ["yarn", "start"]

port 1194 # OpenVPN 服务器监听的端口号
proto udp # 通信协议
dev tun # 隧道类型
ca /usr/share/easy-rsa/pki/ca.crt # CA 根证书
cert /usr/share/easy-rsa/pki/issued/server.crt # 服务器证书
key /usr/share/easy-rsa/pki/private/server.key # 服务器私钥
dh none # 禁用 DH 算法
topology subnet # 配置先导模式
server 10.8.0.0 255.255.255.0 # 配置 OpenVPN 网络子网
ifconfig-pool-persist ipp.txt # 为客户端分配 IP 地址
push "redirect-gateway def1 bypass-dhcp" # 客户端连接时，强制通过 OpenVPN 访问互联网
push "dhcp-option DNS 208.67.222.222" # 将 OpenDNS 作为默认 DNS 服务器
push "dhcp-option DNS 208.67.220.220" # 将 OpenDNS 作为备用 DNS 服务器
keepalive 10 120 # 客户端和服务器之间的心跳包检测，10 秒间隔，120 秒无响应则认为连接断开
comp-lzo # 开启压缩
user nobody # 用户名
group nogroup # 组名
persist-key
persist-tun
status openvpn-status.log # 状态文件
log-append  openvpn.log # OpenVPN 日志文件
verb 3 # 日志级别

client # 指定为 OpenVPN 客户端
dev tun # 隧道类型
proto udp # 通信协议
remote my-server-1.com 1194 # 指定 OpenVPN 服务器和端口号
resolv-retry infinite # 重试设置
nobind # 不绑定到特定 IP 和端口
persist-key
persist-tun
ca ca.crt # 客户端添加 CA 根证书
cert client1.crt # 客户端证书
key client1.key # 客户端私钥
comp-lzo
verb 3

client # 指定为 OpenVPN 客户端
dev tun # 隧道类型
proto udp # 通信协议
remote my-server-2.com 1194 # 指定 OpenVPN 服务器和端口号
resolv-retry infinite # 重试设置
nobind # 不绑定到特定 IP 和端口
persist-key
persist-tun
ca ca.crt # 客户端添加 CA 根证书
cert client1.crt # 客户端证书
key client1.key # 客户端私钥
comp-lzo
verb 3
route 1.2.3.4 255.255.255.255 vpn_gateway # 添加稳定 IP 的路由

Fixpoint sum_n_quartic (n : nat) : nat :=
  match n with
    O   => 0
  | S p => n*n*n*n + sum_n_quartic p
  end.

Lemma prob4 : forall n : nat,
    sum_n_quartic n * 30 + n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) = n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) * (3 * n * n + 3 * n).
Proof.
  induction n as [|n IH].
  - simpl. reflexivity.
  - simpl. rewrite mult_plus_distr_r. rewrite mult_assoc.
    rewrite <- plus_n_O. rewrite mult_plus_distr_r.
    rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite plus_comm.
    rewrite <- mult_assoc. rewrite IH.
    repeat rewrite mult_plus_distr_r. repeat rewrite mult_plus_distr_l.
    rewrite <- mult_assoc. rewrite <- mult_assoc. rewrite <- mult_assoc.
    rewrite mult_comm with (n := 2) (m := n). rewrite mult_assoc.
    rewrite mult_comm with (n := 3) (m := n). reflexivity.
Qed.

Fixpoint sum_n_quartic (n : nat) : nat :=
  match n with
    O   => 0
  | S p => n*n*n*n + sum_n_quartic p
  end.

Lemma prob4 : forall n : nat,
    sum_n_quartic n * 30 + n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) = n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) * (3 * n * n + 3 * n).
Proof.
  induction n as [|n IH].
  - simpl. reflexivity.
  - rewrite mult_plus_distr_r. rewrite mult_plus_distr_r.
    rewrite mult_plus_distr_l. rewrite mult_plus_distr_l.
    rewrite mult_plus_distr_l. rewrite plus_assoc.
    rewrite <- IH. simpl. ring.
Qed.

Lemma prob4 : forall n : nat,
    sum_n_quartic n * 30 + n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) = n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) * (3 * n * n + 3 * n).
Proof.

    rewrite mult_plus_distr_l. rewrite mult_plus_distr_l.

    rewrite <- IH. simpl sum_n_quartic. ring_simplify.
    repeat rewrite <- mult_assoc. ring.
Qed.

Lemma prob4 : forall n : nat,

  - simpl. ring_simplify. rewrite <- IH. ring.

Require Import Arith.

Inductive div3 : nat -> Prop :=
| div3_0 : div3 0
| div3_S0 : forall n, div3 n -> div3 (S (S (S n)))
| div3_S1 : forall n, div3 n -> div3 (S (S (S (S n))))
| div3_S2 : forall n, div3 n -> div3 (S (S (S (S (S n))))).

Lemma div3_helper : forall n m, n = 3 * m -> div3 n.
Proof.
  induction n; intros m Hm.
  - subst. apply div3_0.
  - destruct m.
    + simpl in Hm. discriminate.
    + rewrite <- plus_n_Sm in Hm. rewrite <- plus_n_Sm in Hm.
      rewrite <- plus_n_Sm in Hm. apply div3_S0.
      apply IHn. inversion Hm as [H']. subst. apply H'.
Qed.

Lemma div3_imply : forall n, div3 n -> exists m, n = 3 * m.
Proof.
  intros n Hn. induction Hn.
  - exists 0. reflexivity.
  - destruct IHHn as [m Hm]. exists m. subst. reflexivity.
  - destruct IHHn as [m Hm]. exists m. subst. reflexivity.
  - destruct IHHn as [m Hm]. exists m. subst. reflexivity.
Qed.

Lemma div3_n : forall n, exists m, n = 3 * m -> div3 n.
Proof.
  intros n. induction n using lt_wf_ind; intros [m Hm].
  destruct n as [|n].
  - apply div3_helper. apply Hm.
  - destruct (Nat.eq_dec (m - n * 3) 0) as [H|H].
    + subst. apply div3_helper. apply Hm.
    + destruct (Nat.eq_dec (m - S n * 3) 0) as [H'|H'].
      * subst. apply div3_helper. rewrite mult_succ_r.
        rewrite plus_comm. apply Hm.
      * destruct (Nat.eq_dec (m - S (S n) * 3) 0) as [H''|H''].
        -- subst. apply div3_helper. rewrite mult_succ_r.
           repeat rewrite plus_comm. apply Hm.
        -- destruct (Nat.eq_dec (m - S (S (S n)) * 3) 0) as [H'''|H'''].
           ++ subst. apply div3_helper.
              repeat rewrite mult_succ_r. repeat rewrite plus_comm.
              apply Hm.
           ++ specialize (H n). rewrite <- lt_n_Sm_iff in H.
              apply H; try omega. exists m. apply Hm.
Qed.

Lemma div3_exists : forall n, div3 n -> exists m, n = 3 * m.
Proof.
  intros n Hn. destruct (div3_imply n Hn) as [m Hm].
  destruct (div3_n n) as [k Hk]; try exists m; apply Hm.
Qed.

Inductive div3 : nat -> Prop :=
  | div0 : div3 0
  | divS : forall n : nat, div3_2 n -> div3 (S n)
with div3_1 : nat -> Prop :=
  | div1 : div3_1 1
  | div1S : forall n : nat, div3 n -> div3_1 (S n)
with div3_2 : nat -> Prop :=
  | div2 : div3_2 2
  | div2S : forall n : nat, div3_1 n -> div3_2 (S n).

Lemma prob8_helper: forall b n : nat, n <= b -> div3 n -> exists m : nat, n = 3 * m.
Proof.
  intros b n Hle Hdiv.
  induction Hdiv as [| n' Hdiv2 IHdiv2 | n' Hdiv1 IHdiv1].
  - (* n = 0 *) exists 0. reflexivity.
  - (* n = S n', div3_2 n' *) destruct n' as [| n''] eqn:E.
    + (* n' = 0 *) inversion Hdiv2.
    + (* n' = S n'' *) simpl in Hdiv2. inversion Hdiv2 as [| n''' Hdiv1' IHdiv1'].
      apply le_S_n in Hle. apply IHdiv2 in Hle as [m' eq].
      exists m'. rewrite eq. reflexivity.
  - (* n = S n', div3_1 n' *) destruct n' as [| n''] eqn:E.
    + (* n' = 0 *) inversion Hdiv1.
    + (* n' = S n'' *) exists n''. reflexivity.
Qed.

Lemma prob8 : forall n : nat, div3 n -> exists m, n = 3 * m.
Proof.
  intros n Hdiv. apply prob8_helper with (b:=n) in Hdiv as [m eq].
  - exists m. apply eq.
  - reflexivity.
Qed.

Рецепт 'Lentil, Apple, and Turkey Wrap ': This is a quick and tasty wrap with lots of sweet and crunchy flavors.
Ингредиенты:
- 1 cup cooked brown rice
- 4 whole wheat tortillas
- 1/2 cup cooked lentils
- 1 apple, cored and sliced
- 4 ounces roasted turkey breast, sliced
- 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese
Шаги:
1. Spread 1/4 cup brown rice onto each tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch border around edges.
2. Divide lentils among tortillas; top with apple slices, turkey, and feta cheese.
3. Fold in 2 sides of each tortilla, then roll up, burrito-style.

Generate an image using Stable Diffusion style.
- Start with a blank canvas.
- Add random noise to the canvas.
- Apply Stable Diffusion algorithm to the canvas.
- Use a color scheme of muted pastels, with hints of warm and cool tones.
- Create an asymmetrical composition, with one dominant focal point.
- Add small details and texture to the image, using cross-hatching or stippling techniques.
- Ensure the image has a sense of depth and dimensionality, with overlapping shapes and varying levels of opacity.

Generate an image in the style of a barrel relief made from corrugated cardboard.
- Start with a canvas that has a textured background in a muted pastel color.
- Add a few rough sketch marks in the center to help form the composition.
- Add randomly cut pieces of corrugated cardboard in various sizes and shades to the canvas.
- Arrange the cardboard shapes in such a way that they create a three-dimensional impression on the surface of the canvas.
- Use darker shades of pastel to apply shadow and highlight effects on the cardboard shapes.
- Create some visual interest by adding a few swatches of brightly colored cardboard.
- Add some textural detail to the cardboard shapes with cross-hatching or stippling techniques.
- Ensure that the image has an overall sense of balance, although it can be asymmetrical or abstract to a degree.

#Specify the base image
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/windows/servercore:ltsc2019 

#Download and install R
ADD https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/R-4.1.0-win.exe C:\R-4.1.0-win.exe
RUN C:\R-4.1.0-win.exe /silent

#Set the environment variables for R
ENV R_HOME="C:\\Program Files\\R\\R-4.1.0" 
RUN setx PATH "%PATH%;%R_HOME%\\bin;%R_HOME%\\x64\\bin" /M

#Copy required files and scripts
WORKDIR /app
COPY src .

#Install required packages
RUN ["Rscript", "--vanilla", "packages.R"]

#Expose the required ports
EXPOSE 80

#Set a default command to launch on startup
CMD ["Rscript", "--vanilla", "server.R"]

CREATE TRIGGER tr_vwCandidateContractRecruiter ON vwCandidateContractRecruiter
INSTEAD OF UPDATE
AS
BEGIN
  UPDATE ec SET 
    ec.siTestScore = i.siTestScore
  FROM ExternalCandidate ec 
  INNER JOIN inserted i ON ec.cCandidateCode = i.cCandidateCode

  UPDATE cr SET 
    cr.cName = i.cName
  FROM ContractRecruiter cr 
  INNER JOIN ExternalCandidate ec ON cr.cContractRecruiterCode = ec.cContractRecruiterCode
  INNER JOIN inserted i ON ec.cCandidateCode = i.cCandidateCode
END

# YouthCove

YouthCove is an open-source social media platform designed for young people and teens. It provides a safe and engaging environment for users to connect, share, and communicate with their peers.

## Features

- User authentication and profile management
- Create, edit, and delete posts with text, images, and videos
- Comment on and like posts
- Follow and message other users
- Customizable user interface with dark mode support

## Getting Started

These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes.

### Prerequisites

- Node.js (v14 or higher)
- Yarn package manager
- A modern web browser (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, Safari)

### Installation

1. Clone the repository:

This will create a `build` folder containing the optimized files ready for deployment.

## Contributing

Please read [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on our code of conduct, and the process for submitting pull requests.

## License

This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details.

# Contributing to YouthCove

First off, thank you for considering contributing to YouthCove. It's people like you that make YouthCove such a great platform.

## Code of Conduct

By participating in this project, you are expected to uphold our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).

## How Can I Contribute?

### Reporting Bugs

- Ensure the bug was not already reported by searching on GitHub under [Issues](https://github.com/your-username/YouthCove/issues).
- If you're unable to find an open issue addressing the problem, [open a new one](https://github.com/your-username/YouthCove/issues/new). Be sure to include a **title and clear description**, as much relevant information as possible, and a **code sample** or an **executable test case** demonstrating the expected behavior that is not occurring.

### Suggesting Enhancements

- Before creating enhancement suggestions, please check the [Issues](https://github.com/your-username/YouthCove/issues) list as you might find out that you don't need to create one. When you are creating an enhancement suggestion, please include as many details as possible, including the steps that you imagine you would take if the feature you're requesting existed.

### Pull Requests

- Ensure any install or build dependencies are removed before the end of the layer when doing a build.
- Update the README.md with details of changes to the interface, this includes new environment variables, exposed ports, useful file locations, and container parameters.
- Increase the version numbers in any examples files and the README.md to the new version that this Pull Request would represent. The versioning scheme we use is [SemVer](http://semver.org/).
- You may merge the Pull Request in once you have the sign-off of two other developers, or if you do not have permission to do that, you may request the second reviewer to merge it for you.

## Styleguides

### Git Commit Messages

- Use the present tense ("Add feature" not "Added feature")
- Use the imperative mood ("Move cursor to..." not "Moves cursor to...")
- Limit the first line to 72 characters or less
- Reference issues and pull requests liberally after the first line
- When only changing documentation, include `[ci skip]` in the commit description

### JavaScript Styleguide

All JavaScript must adhere to [JavaScript Standard Style](https://standardjs.com/).

### CSS Styleguide

- Use hyphen-separated class and ID names (e.g., `navigation-bar` not `navigationBar`)
- Use meaningful names for classes and IDs
- Comment your code where necessary

## Acknowledgments

- Hat tip to anyone whose code was used
- Inspiration
- etc

# Configuration

This folder contains the configuration files for UpKeeper.

## Getting Started

1. Copy `config.sample.json` to `config.json`.
2. Update the values in `config.json` with your own settings.

## Configuration Options

- `database`: Database connection settings.
  - `host`: Database host.
  - `port`: Database port.
  - `user`: Database user.
  - `password`: Database password.
  - `database`: Database name.

- `server`: Server settings.
  - `port`: Port on which the server will run.

- `email`: Email settings for sending notifications.
  - `service`: Email service provider (e.g., 'gmail').
  - `user`: Email address.
  - `password`: Email password.

- `monitoring`: Monitoring settings.
  - `interval`: Time interval (in minutes) between monitoring checks.

- `jwt`: JSON Web Token settings.
  - `secret`: Secret key for signing tokens.
  - `expiresIn`: Token expiration time.

# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the poetry.lock and pyproject.toml files to the working directory
COPY poetry.lock pyproject.toml /app/

# Install dependencies using Poetry
RUN pip install poetry && \
    poetry config virtualenvs.create false && \
    poetry install --no-dev --no-root

# Copy the models folder to the working directory
COPY models/ /app/models/

# Install dependencies for each model
RUN for dir in /app/models/*/; do pip install --no-cache-dir -r $dir/requirements.txt || true; done

# Copy the rest of the application code to the working directory
COPY . /app/

# Set the entrypoint for the container
ENTRYPOINT ["hypercorn", "api", "-b", "0.0.0.0"]

# Expose additional ports for Gitpod
EXPOSE 8888

(defun get-entities-actives ()
  (setq line (car (entsel "\nSelect a line: ")))
  (setq line-ename (car line))
  (setq line-data (entget line-ename))
  (setq line-obj (vlax-ename->vla-object line-ename))
  (setq circle (car (entsel "\nSelect a circle: ")))
  (setq circle-ename (car circle))
  (setq circle-data (entget circle-ename))
  (setq circle-obj (vlax-ename->vla-object circle-ename))
  (princ "Line ActiveX object: ")
  (princ line-obj)
  (princ "\nCircle ActiveX object: ")
  (princ circle-obj)
)

CREATE PROCEDURE CreateTableProcedures
    @tableName VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    -- ایجاد stored procedure حذف رکورد با id
    DECLARE @deleteProc varchar(1000)
    SET @deleteProc = 'CREATE PROCEDURE DeleteProc
                        @id int
                    AS
                    BEGIN
                        DELETE FROM ' + @tableName + '
                        WHERE id = @id;
                    END'
    EXEC (@deleteProc)
    
    -- ایجاد stored procedure ایجاد یک رکورد جدید
    DECLARE @insertProc varchar(1000)
    SET @insertProc = 'CREATE PROCEDURE InsertProc
                        @value1 varchar(50),
                        @value2 varchar(50),
                        @value3 varchar(50)
                    AS
                    BEGIN
                        INSERT INTO ' + @tableName + '(column1, column2, column3)
                        VALUES(@value1,@value2,@value3)
                    END'
    EXEC (@insertProc)
    
    -- ایجاد stored procedure حذف رکورد با id و ورودی دادن مقدار آن
    DECLARE @deleteByIdProc varchar(1000)
    SET @deleteByIdProc = 'CREATE PROCEDURE DeleteByIdProc
                            @id int
                        AS
                        BEGIN
                            DELETE FROM ' + @tableName + '
                            WHERE id = @id;
                        END'
    EXEC (@deleteByIdProc)
    
    -- ایجاد stored procedure به روزرسانی رکورد با id
    DECLARE @updateByIdProc varchar(1000)
    SET @updateByIdProc = 'CREATE PROCEDURE UpdateByIdProc
                            @id int,
                            @value1 varchar(50),
                            @value2 varchar(50),
                            @value3 varchar(50)
                        AS
                        BEGIN
                            UPDATE ' + @tableName + '
                            SET column1 = @value1, column2 = @value2, column3 = @value3
                            WHERE id = @id;
                        END'
    EXEC (@updateByIdProc)
END

; 定义反应器
(defun my-reactor (obj / pt)
  (setq pt (vlax-invoke obj 'getboundingbox))
  (command "_.rectang" (list (car pt) (cadr pt)) (list (cadr pt) (car pt)))
)

; 定义函数，用于启用反应器
(defun enable-reactor ()
  (setq reactObj (vlr-object-reactor "my-reactor" :vlr-invoke-for-all-entities))
  (vlr-set-notification reactObj 8)  ; 注册一个 Text 实体改变的通知
)

; 启用反应器
(enable-reactor)

 6. Selama masih ada simpul yang belum dijalankan:
 |   
 |  a. Pilih simpul dengan jarak terkecil dalam struktur data
 |  b. Hapus simpul yang terpilih dari struktur data "Simpul yang belum dijalankan"
 |  c. Jika simpul yang terpilih sama dengan titik akhir (B), lanjutkan ke langkah 10.
 |  d. Jelajahi simpul yang terpilih dengan menambahkan jarak dari simpul yang terpilih ke setiap simpul yang terhubung dan perbarui jarak simpul yang terhubung
 |  e. Selama menyusuri, perbarui struktur data "Simpul yang belum dijalankan" dengan prioritas terbarukan berdasarkan jarak terbaru
 |
 v
 7. Gunakan jarak tertinggi yang dicatat untuk titik akhir (B) sebagai jarak terpendek secara keseluruhan dari titik awal (A) ke titik akhir (B)
 |
 v
 8. Tampilkan rute terdekat dengan mengikuti jalur di mana jarak terpendek telah diperbarui dan mencapai titik akhir (B)
 |

 9. Jika diperlukan, tampilkan rute alternatif dengan jarak kedua terpendek, ketiga terpendek, dan seterusnya

1. Mulai
2. Tentukan variabel-variabel yang akan digunakan:
   a. jumlahTrafikJalanA, jumlahTrafikJalanB, jumlahTrafikJalanC, jumlahTrafikJalanD (untuk menyimpan jumlah kendaraan di setiap jalan)
   b. durasiLampuHijau = [0, 0, 0, 0] (untuk menyimpan durasi lampu hijau untuk setiap jalan)
   c. durasiLampuMerah = konstanta (durasi lampu merah untuk setiap jalan)
   d. durasiMinimalLampuHijau = konstanta (durasi minimal lampu hijau yang diperbolehkan)
   e. durasiMaksimalLampuHijau = konstanta (durasi maksimal lampu hijau yang diperbolehkan)
3. Terus-menerus lakukan langkah berikut:
   a. Baca jumlahTrafikJalanA, jumlahTrafikJalanB, jumlahTrafikJalanC, jumlahTrafikJalanD dari sensor atau kamera di masing-masing jalan
   b. Hitung durasiLampuHijau untuk setiap jalan berdasarkan jumlah trafik. Rumusnya bisa seperti ini:
      durasiLampuHijau[i] = durasiMinimalLampuHijau + (jumlahTrafikJalan[i] / (jumlahTrafikJalanA + jumlahTrafikJalanB + jumlahTrafikJalanC + jumlahTrafikJalanD)) * (durasiMaksimalLampuHijau - durasiMinimalLampuHijau)
Segue
      i. Pastikan durasiLampuHijau[i] tidak lebih kecil dari durasiMinimalLampuHijau dan tidak lebih besar dari durasiMaksimalLampuHijau
      ii. Jika perlu, normalisasi hasil perhitungan agar total durasi lampu hijau untuk semua jalan sama dengan durasiMaksimalLampuHijau * 4
      iii. Nyala lampu hijau di JalanA dari selatan ke utara (arah kiri) dan JalanB dari barat ke timur (arah kanan)
   c. Atur lampu lalu lintas berdasarkan durasiLampuHijau yang dihitung:
      i. Nyala lampu hijau di JalanA (arah kiri kanan) selama durasiLampuHijau[0], sementara JalanB, JalanC, dan JalanD tetap lampu merah
      ii. Tunggu durasiLampuHijau[0], lalu nyala lampu merah di JalanA dan nyala lampu hijau di JalanB (arah kiri kanan) selama durasiLampuHijau[1]
      iii. Tunggu durasiLampuHijau[1], lalu nyala lampu merah di JalanB dan nyala lampu hijau di JalanC (arah kiri kanan) selama durasiLampuHijau[2]
      iv. Tunggu durasiLampuHijau[2], lalu nyala lampu merah di JalanC dan nyala lampu hijau di JalanD (arah kiri kanan) selama durasiLampuHijau[3]
      v. Tunggu durasiLampuHijau[3], lalu nyala lampu merah di JalanD
   d. Kembali ke langkah 3a

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT NOT NULL,
  flight_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  flight_day DATE NOT NULL,
  departure_time TIME NOT NULL,
  arrival_time TIME NOT NULL,
  departure_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  arrival_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  distance INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES Aircraft(aircraft_id)
    ON UPDATE CASCADE
    ON DELETE CASCADE
);

# Base image
FROM ubuntu:latest

# Install necessary dependencies
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl git unzip xz-utils zip libglu1-mesa openjdk-8-jre

# Set up Flutter environment variables
ENV FLUTTER_HOME=/usr/local/flutter
ENV FLUTTER_VERSION=2.8.1

# Download and extract Flutter SDK
RUN cd /usr/local && \
    curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_${FLUTTER_VERSION}-stable.tar.xz && \
    tar xf flutter_linux_${FLUTTER_VERSION}-stable.tar.xz

# Add Flutter to the system path
ENV PATH="$PATH:$FLUTTER_HOME/bin"

# Accept Flutter licenses
RUN flutter doctor --android-licenses

# Enable Desktop support for Flutter
RUN flutter channel dev
RUN flutter upgrade
RUN flutter config --enable-linux-desktop

# Clone your app's repository
RUN git clone <your_app_repository_url> /app

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Fetch Flutter dependencies
RUN flutter packages get

# Build the release version of the app
RUN flutter build linux --release

# Your app's entry point command
CMD ["./build/linux/x64/release/bundle/app"]

# Use Archlinux as the base image
FROM archlinux

# Install required dependencies
RUN pacman -Syu --noconfirm \
    base-devel \
    git \
    sudo \
    wget \
    unzip \
    zip \
    xorg-server-xvfb \
    lib32-gcc-libs \
    lib32-glibc \
    lib32-libstdc++5 \
    lib32-zlib

# Set up environment variables
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8

# Set up Flutter SDK environment variables
ENV FLUTTER_HOME /usr/local/flutter
ENV FLUTTER_VERSION beta

# Download and install Flutter SDK
RUN git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git ${FLUTTER_HOME}
ENV PATH ${FLUTTER_HOME}/bin:${PATH}

# Accept Flutter licenses
RUN flutter --version
RUN flutter doctor --android-licenses

# Enable Flutter web support
RUN flutter channel dev
RUN flutter upgrade
RUN flutter config --enable-web

# Create and set the workdir
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the Flutter app source code and install dependencies
COPY . /app
RUN flutter packages get

# Build the Flutter app
RUN flutter build web

# Expose the default Flutter web server port (optional)
EXPOSE 5000

# Start the Flutter web server
CMD ["flutter", "run", "--release", "-d", "web-server", "--web-port", "5000"]

(defun move-text-to-bottom-left (polyline)
  (setq polyline (vlax-ename->vla-object polyline))
  
  (setq polyline-data (entget polyline))
  
  (foreach attribute polyline-data
    (if (= (cdr (assoc 0 attribute)) "TEXT")
      (progn
        (setq text-entity (vlax-ename->vla-object (cdr (assoc -1 attribute))))
        (setq text-position (vlax-get-property text-entity 'position))
        
        ; 计算文字实体的左下角点坐标
        (setq text-width (vlax-get-property text-entity 'width))
        (setq text-height (vlax-get-property text-entity 'height))
        (setq text-bottom-left (list (- (car text-position) (/ text-width 2.0)) (- (cadr text-position) text-height)))
        
        ; 移动文字实体到左下角
        (vlax-put-property text-entity 'position text-bottom-left)
        (vlax-put-property text-entity 'width 0) ; 清除文字宽度属性以避免变形
        (vlax-put-property text-entity 'height 0) ; 清除文字高度属性以避免变形
        
        ; 更新文字实体的属性
        (entupd (vlax-vla-object->ename text-entity))
        
        ; 更新多段线的属性
        (setq polyline-data (subst attribute (assoc -1 attribute) polyline-data))
        )
      )
    )
  
  ; 更新多段线的属性
  (entmod polyline-data)
  
  ; 更新多段线实体的属性
  (entupd (vlax-vla-object->ename polyline))
  )

(defun move-text-to-bottom-left (text-entity rectangle-entity)
  (setq text-entity (vlax-ename->vla-object text-entity))
  (setq rectangle-entity (vlax-ename->vla-object rectangle-entity))
  
  (setq text-data (entget text-entity))
  (setq rectangle-data (entget rectangle-entity))
  
  (setq text-position (vlax-get-property text-entity 'position))
  
  ; 计算矩形框实体的左下角点坐标
  (setq rectangle-min-point (cadr (assoc 10 rectangle-data)))
  (setq rectangle-width (cadr (assoc 40 rectangle-data)))
  (setq rectangle-height (cadr (assoc 41 rectangle-data)))
  (setq rectangle-bottom-left (list (car rectangle-min-point) (- (cadr rectangle-min-point) rectangle-height)))
  
  ; 移动文字实体到左下角
  (vlax-put-property text-entity 'position rectangle-bottom-left)
  
  ; 更新文字实体的属性
  (entupd (vlax-vla-object->ename text-entity))
  
  ; 更新矩形框实体的属性
  (entmod rectangle-data)
  )

(defun select-text-in-rectangle (rectangle)
  (setq rectangle (vlax-ename->vla-object rectangle))
  
  (setq rectangle-data (entget rectangle))
  
  (foreach attribute rectangle-data
    (if (= (cdr (assoc 0 attribute)) "TEXT")
      (progn
        ; 对找到的文字实体进行相应的操作
        (setq text-entity (vlax-ename->vla-object (cdr (assoc -1 attribute))))
        (princ (vlax-get-property text-entity 'text))
        ; 在此可根据需要对文字实体进行进一步处理
        )
      )
    )
  )

(defun select-entities-in-window (corner1 corner2)
  (setq ss (ssget "_W" corner1 corner2)) ; 创建一个选择集，按照两个角点进行框选

  (if ss
    (progn
      (setq entities '()) ; 创建一个空列表来保存获取的图元实体
      
      ; 遍历选择集并将图元实体添加到列表中
      (repeat (sslength ss)
        (setq ent (ssname ss 0))
        (setq entities (cons ent entities))
        (setq ss (ssdel (vlax-vla-object->ename (vlax-ename->vla-object ent)) ss))
      )

      entities ; 返回获取的图元实体列表
    )
    (princ "No entities selected.") ; 如果选择集为空，则打印相应的消息
  )
)

;; Set up Habitica API credentials
(setq habitica-api-user "YOUR_USER_ID")
(setq habitica-api-key "YOUR_API_KEY")

;; Function to log training days
(defun log-training-day ()
  "Log a training day in Habitica."
  (interactive)
  (habitica-create-task "Training Day"))

;; Set keybinding for logging training days
(global-set-key (kbd "C-c t") 'log-training-day)

;; Set up Habitica API credentials
(setq habitica-api-user "YOUR_USER_ID")
(setq habitica-api-key "YOUR_API_KEY")

;; Set up org-mode for capturing cleaning tasks
(setq org-default-notes-file "~/path/to/your/notes.org")

;; Define cleaning template for org-capture
(setq org-capture-templates
      '(("c" "Cleaning Day" entry (file+headline org-default-notes-file "Cleaning")
         "* TODO Cleaning %?\n   SCHEDULED: <%<%Y-%m-%d %a>>")))

;; Function to log cleaning day
(defun log-cleaning-day ()
  "Log a cleaning day in Habitica and org-mode."
  (interactive)
  (org-capture nil "c")
  (habitica-create-task "Cleaning Day"))

;; Set keybinding for logging cleaning days
(global-set-key (kbd "C-c c") 'log-cleaning-day)

;; Set up Habitica API credentials
(setq habitica-api-user "YOUR_USER_ID")
(setq habitica-api-key "YOUR_API_KEY")

;; Function to log a completed habit
(defun log-habit (habit-id)
  "Log a completed habit in Habitica."
  (interactive "sHabit ID: ")
  (habitica-log-habit habit-id))

;; Function to increment a habit streak
(defun increment-habit-streak (habit-id)
  "Increment the streak of a habit in Habitica."
  (interactive "sHabit ID: ")
  (habitica-increment-habit-streak habit-id))

;; Set keybindings for logging habits and incrementing streaks
(global-set-key (kbd "C-c l") 'log-habit)
(global-set-key (kbd "C-c i") 'increment-habit-streak)

CREATE TABLE test_cdp_behavior_snap_area (
    area_id BIGINT(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '区域ID',
    snap_date DATE NOT NULL COMMENT '快照日期',
    create_time DATETIME NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
    update_time DATETIME NOT NULL COMMENT '更新时间',
    state INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '状态 <=0:无效数据; 1:有效; 2:中间转换数据',
    id VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '记录id uuid',
    rz bitmap BITMAP_UNION NULL COMMENT '认知',
    xq bitmap BITMAP_UNION NULL COMMENT '兴趣',
    gm bitmap BITMAP_UNION NULL COMMENT '购买',
    zc bitmap BITMAP_UNION NULL COMMENT '忠诚'
)
ENGINE=OLAP
COMMENT '行为快照测试表'
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(area_id, snap_date) BUCKETS 10
PROPERTIES (
    "replication_allocation" = "tag.location.default: 3",
    "storage_format" = "V2",
    "light_schema_change" = "true",
    "disable_auto_compaction" = "false",
    "enable_single_replica_compaction" = "false"
);

# Base Docker image
FROM archlinux

# Update the system and install required packages
RUN pacman -Syu --noconfirm \
    && pacman -S --noconfirm protobuf git make

# Install Flutter SDK
RUN git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable /usr/local/flutter
ENV PATH="/usr/local/flutter/bin:${PATH}"

# Set up Android dependencies
RUN yes | $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager --licenses
RUN yes | $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager --update
RUN yes | $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager "platform-tools" "platforms;android-30"

# Set up Flutter dependencies
RUN flutter config --no-analytics
RUN flutter doctor --android-licenses

# Set up the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the Flutter project to the working directory
COPY . .

# Set the default command to build the Flutter app
CMD ["flutter", "build", "apk"]

START
    DECLARE variable num1, num2, result
    READ num1
    READ num2
    result = num1 + num2
    PRINT "The result is: " + result
END

START
    SET sum = 0
    SET count = 0

    FOR each number IN array
        sum = sum + number
        count = count + 1
    END FOR

    SET average = sum / count

    PRINT "The average is: " + average
END

// Événement Clique du bouton de reconnaissance de plaque
PROCÉDURE BTN_ReconnaissancePlaque.Clique()
    // Chemin de l'image à analyser
    cheminImage est une Chaîne = fChoisir(FCheminComplet("Sélectionnez une image"), "Images (*.bmp;*.jpg;*.png)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.png")
    
    SI cheminImage <> "" ALORS
        // Appel de la fonction de reconnaissance de plaque
        textePlaque est une Chaîne = ReconnaissancePlaque(cheminImage)
        
        SI textePlaque <> "" ALORS
            Info("La plaque d'immatriculation reconnue est : " + textePlaque)
        SINON
            Info("Aucune plaque d'immatriculation n'a été reconnue.")
        FIN
    FIN
FINPROCÉDURE

* HSPICE DDR Eye Diagram Simulation
* Define parameters
.PARAM period = 2e-9     * 编码器时钟周期
.PARAM t_rise = 100e-12  * 上升时间
.PARAM t_fall = 100e-12  * 下降时间
.PARAM t_en = 100e-9     * 使能时间
.PARAM t_dis = 100e-12   * 禁能时间
.PARAM t_dq = 150e-12    * DQ数据延迟时间
.PARAM v_diff = 0.3      * 差分电压

* Define waveform
.VSCLK VCLK GND PULSE(0 1.5 {t_rise} {t_fall} 0 0 {period})
.VSEN VEN GND STEP(0 0 {t_dis} {t_dis} {t_dis} {t_en})

* Define DDR DRAM Load
.CAPACITANCE CAPDQ CLKG 16p    
.CAPACITANCE CAPDQ# CLKG# 16p 

* Define the transmission lines
.SUBCKT DRAM_DQ_LINE DQ IN OUT
RS IN MID {50m}
LS MID OUT {10u}
CP OUT GND {0.4}
.ENDS

* Define the termination resistor
.SUBCKT DRAM_TERM_RESISTOR N1 OUT
R OUT N1 50
.ENDS

* DDR3 DRAM DQ I/O
XDRAM_DQ LINE_DQ[0] DQ(IN) DQ_OUT[0]
XDRAM_TERM_R DQ_OUT_D_0 LINE_DQ# [0]


* Simulate the DDR eye diagram
.TRAN 10p 15n
.DIC analysis=kfactor                                    
.PROBE V(CLKA) V(DQ_OUT[0])

# Self-Media Literacy for Newcomers

## Introduction

Welcome, newcomers, to the world of self-media! In today's digital age, self-media has become a powerful tool for content creation, personal branding, and sharing your thoughts and ideas with a wide audience. However, with great power comes great responsibility. It is crucial for newcomers to develop self-media literacy to navigate this dynamic landscape effectively.

## What is Self-Media?

Self-media refers to channels where individuals create and distribute their own content, such as blogs, vlogs (video blogs), podcasts, and social media platforms. Unlike traditional media, self-media allows everyone to become a publisher, enabling individuals to express themselves, build communities, and influence others.

## The Importance of Self-Media Literacy

1. Critical Thinking Skills:
   - Assess the reliability and credibility of information found on self-media platforms.
   - Distinguish between facts, opinions, and misleading content.
   - Scrutinize sources and cross-verify information before accepting it as truth.

2. Digital Footprint Management:
   - Understand the implications of sharing personal content online.
   - Practice privacy settings to protect personal information.
   - Think before posting to maintain a positive digital presence.

3. Responsible Content Creation:
   - Ethically create and publish content that respects intellectual property rights.
   - Avoid plagiarism, slander, or the spread of false information.
   - Practice responsible fact-checking before sharing content.

4. Engagement and Community Building:
   - Foster healthy and respectful online conversations.
   - Encourage constructive feedback and respond thoughtfully.
   - Build a support network by connecting and collaborating with like-minded individuals.

## Self-Media Best Practices

1. Authenticity:
   - Stay true to your voice and values.
   - Share unique perspectives and experiences that resonate with your audience.

2. Consistency:
   - Regularly create and publish quality content.
   - Engage with your audience consistently to build trust and loyalty.

3. Research and Knowledge:
   - Stay well-informed about relevant topics within your niche.
   - Continuously learn and adapt your content to provide value.

4. Ethical Collaboration:
   - Collaborate with other self-media creators for mutual growth.
   - Give credit and respect intellectual property rights when collaborating.

## Conclusion

Developing self-media literacy is essential for newcomers to navigate the ever-evolving landscape of self-media. By honing critical thinking skills, managing digital footprints, practicing responsible content creation, and embracing best practices, newcomers can effectively harness the power of self-media for personal and professional success.

Remember, your self-media journey is just beginning. Embrace the opportunities it offers, but always strive to use it responsibly and ethically. Happy creating!

CREATE TABLE `app_cdp_category_ym_snap`
(
    `area_id`      BIGINT(20)  NOT NULL COMMENT '区域ID',
    `goods_lib_id` BIGINT      NOT NULL COMMENT '商品库ID',
    `cid`          BIGINT      NOT NULL COMMENT '商品类目ID',
    `cycle`        VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '时间区间；近7天、近30天、近60天、近90天、近180天、近365天',
    `type`         INT(11)     NOT NULL COMMENT '数据指标：1-销售额、2-销售件数、3-销售订单数、4-购买人数、5-下单商品件数、6-成交商品件数、7-动销商品个数（去重）、8-退款数、9-退款率',
    `update_time`  DATETIME    NOT NULL COMMENT '更新时间',
    `state`        TINYINT(1)  REPLACE_IF_NOT_NULL NULL COMMENT '状态 0:无效数据; 1:有效;',
    `value`        decimalv3(36,2) REPLACE_IF_NOT_NULL NULL COMMENT '当前周期指标值',
    `month_on_month` decimalv3(36,2) REPLACE_IF_NOT_NULL NULL COMMENT '环比上周期指标值',
    `year_on_year` decimalv3(36,2) REPLACE_IF_NOT_NULL NULL COMMENT '同比去年指标值'
) ENGINE = OLAP Unique KEY(`area_id`, `goods_lib_id`, `cid`, `cycle`, `type`, `update_time`)
COMMENT 'cdp品类同环比值快照表'
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`area_id`, `goods_lib_id`, `cid`, `cycle`, `type`, `update_time`) BUCKETS 10

UPDATE tableA 
    LEFT JOIN tableB ON tableA.品类ID = tableB.ID
SET 
    tableA.交易金额 = CASE WHEN tableB.字段名称 = '交易金额' THEN tableB.字段值 END,
    tableA.交易件数 = CASE WHEN tableB.字段名称 = '交易件数' THEN tableB.字段值 END,
    tableA.购买次数 = CASE WHEN tableB.字段名称 = '购买次数' THEN tableB.字段值 END,
    tableA.购买人数 = CASE WHEN tableB.字段名称 = '购买人数' THEN tableB.字段值 END;

# Custom command: /rtp or /randomtp
command /rtp:
  aliases: /randomtp
  trigger:
    if loop-player has permission "donutsmp.rtp": # Check if the player has permission to use /rtp
      open virtual chest inventory with size 27 named "&8Teleportation Menu": # Open a virtual chest inventory menu
        loop 27 times:
          set slot loop-number of chest inventory to air
        set slot 13 of chest inventory to netherrack named "&cGo to Nether" # Set the middle slot to a netherrack block
        set slot 20 of chest inventory to grass_block named "&aGo to Overworld" # Set slot 2 to a grass block
        set slot 24 of chest inventory to end_stone named "&dGo to End" # Set slot 4 to an end stone

# Handle chest inventory click event
on inventory click:
  if event-inventory is chest inventory named "&8Teleportation Menu":
    cancel event
    if clicked item is air:
      stop # Exit if an empty slot is clicked

    if name of clicked item is "&cGo to Nether": # Check if netherrack block is clicked
      execute console command "rtp world world_nether" # Execute the /rtp command to teleport to the Nether
      close the inventory # Close the menu
    else if name of clicked item is "&aGo to Overworld": # Check if grass block is clicked
      execute console command "rtp world world" # Execute the /rtp command to teleport to the overworld
      close the inventory # Close the menu
    else if name of clicked item is "&dGo to End": # Check if end stone is clicked
      execute console command "rtp world_the_end" # Execute the /rtp command to teleport to The End
      close the inventory # Close the menu

# Custom command: /home
command /home:
  trigger:
    open virtual chest inventory with size 54 named "&8Home Menu": # Open a virtual chest inventory menu
      loop 54 times:
        set slot loop-number of chest inventory to air
      set slot 53 of chest inventory to barrier named "&cBack" # Set the last slot to a barrier (Back button)
      execute console command "homes list" # Execute the "homes list" command to get a list of the player's homes

# Handle chest inventory click event
on inventory click:
  if event-inventory is chest inventory named "&8Home Menu":
    cancel event
    if clicked item is air:
      stop # Exit if an empty slot is clicked

    if name of clicked item is "&cBack" and loop-player has permission "donutsmp.home.back": # Check if the Back button is clicked
      close the inventory # Close the menu and go back to the previous menu or action

    execute console command "homes list" # Execute the "homes list" command again to refresh the list of the player's homes

    if name of clicked item starts with "&aHome ": # Check if a home item is clicked
      set {_homeName} to name of clicked item without "&aHome " # Extract the home name from the clicked item's name
      if {_homeName} is "Create New Home": # Check if the Create New Home button is clicked
        execute console command "homes create" # Execute the "homes create" command to create a new home
        close the inventory # Close the menu
      else if {_homeName} is "Delete Home": # Check if the Delete Home button is clicked
        if loop-player has permission "donutsmp.home.delete": # Check if the player has permission to delete homes
          execute console command "homes delete {_homeName}" # Execute the "homes delete" command with the selected home name
          close the inventory # Close the menu
        else:
          send "&cYou do not have permission to delete homes."
      else: # Regular home teleportation
        execute console command "homes teleport {_homeName}" # Execute the "homes teleport" command with the selected home name
        close the inventory # Close the menu

MERGE INTO 目标表
USING 源表 ON (条件)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET 列名 = 值
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (列1, 列2, ...)
    VALUES (值1, 值2, ...)

DATA: lt_snake TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF string WITH HEADER LINE,
      lv_apple_x TYPE i,
      lv_apple_y TYPE i,
      lv_game_over TYPE abap_bool,
      lv_score TYPE i.

CONSTANTS: c_board_size_x TYPE i VALUE 30,
           c_board_size_y TYPE i VALUE 20,
           c_snake_head TYPE char1 VALUE '*',
           c_snake_body TYPE char1 VALUE '#',
           c_apple TYPE char1 VALUE '@'.

START-OF-SELECTION.

  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>attach_event_handler(
    EXPORTING
      event_id = cl_gui_frontend_services=>event_id_user_command
      iv_fieldname = 'S_SCR'
    CHANGING
      ct_handler = lt_snake ).

  PERFORM initialize_game.

  DO.
    CALL METHOD cl_gui_cfw=>flush.
    PERFORM check_user_command.
    PERFORM move_snake.
    PERFORM check_collision.
    PERFORM display_game_board.
    PERFORM draw_snake.
    PERFORM draw_apple.
    WAIT UP TO 1 SECONDS.
  ENDDO.

FORM initialize_game.
  CLEAR lt_snake.
  APPEND '15-15' TO lt_snake.
  APPEND '14-15' TO lt_snake.
  APPEND '13-15' TO lt_snake.
  lv_apple_x = 20.
  lv_apple_y = 10.
  lv_score = 0.
  lv_game_over = abap_false.
ENDFORM.

FORM check_user_command.
  DATA: lv_key TYPE c.

  CALL METHOD cl_gui_cfw=>read_user_command
    IMPORTING
      ev_command = lv_key.

  CASE lv_key.
    WHEN 'W'.
      MOVE-CORRESPONDING lt_snake TO lt_snake[2].
      lt_snake[1] = ( lt_snake[1] - 0(2) && '-' && lt_snake[1] + 3(2) ).
    WHEN 'S'.
      MOVE-CORRESPONDING lt_snake TO lt_snake[2].
      lt_snake[1] = ( lt_snake[1] + 0(2) && '-' && lt_snake[1] + 3(2) ).
    WHEN 'A'.
      MOVE-CORRESPONDING lt_snake TO lt_snake[2].
      lt_snake[1] = ( lt_snake[1] - 3(2) && '-' && lt_snake[1] + 0(2) ).
    WHEN 'D'.
      MOVE-CORRESPONDING lt_snake TO lt_snake[2].
      lt_snake[1] = ( lt_snake[1] + 3(2) && '-' && lt_snake[1] + 0(2) ).
    WHEN OTHERS.
  ENDCASE.
ENDFORM.

FORM move_snake.
  DO lines( lt_snake ) - 1 TIMES.
    lt_snake[ sy-index+1 ] = lt_snake[ sy-index ].
  ENDDO.
ENDFORM.

FORM check_collision.
  DATA: lv_snake_x TYPE i,
        lv_snake_y TYPE i.
  
  SPLIT lv_snake_head AT '-' INTO lv_snake_x lv_snake_y.
  
  IF lv_snake_x < 1 OR lv_snake_x > c_board_size_x OR
     lv_snake_y < 1 OR lv_snake_y > c_board_size_y.
    SET USER-COMMAND 'CANC'.
    lv_game_over = abap_true.
  ENDIF.
  
  LOOP AT lt_snake INTO DATA(lv_segment) FROM 2 TO LINES( lt_snake ).
    IF lv_segment = lt_snake[ 1 ].
      SET USER-COMMAND 'CANC'.
      lv_game_over = abap_true.
    ENDIF.
  ENDLOOP.
  
  IF lv_snake_x = lv_apple_x AND lv_snake_y = lv_apple_y.
    APPEND lt_snake[ sy-index-1 ] TO lt_snake.
    CALL FUNCTION 'RANDOM_INTEGER'
      EXPORTING
        low = 1
        high = c_board_size_x
      IMPORTING
        random_integer = lv_apple_x.
    CALL FUNCTION 'RANDOM_INTEGER'
      EXPORTING
        low = 1
        high = c_board_size_y
      IMPORTING
        random_integer = lv_apple_y.
    lv_score = lv_score + 1.
  ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

FORM draw_snake.
  LOOP AT lt_snake INTO DATA(lv_segment).
    CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>set_position
      EXPORTING
        row = lv_segment[ 3(2) ]
        column = lv_segment[ 7(2) ].
    IF sy-index = 1.
      WRITE c_snake_head.
    ELSE.
      WRITE c_snake_body.
    ENDIF.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDFORM.

FORM draw_apple.
  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>set_position
    EXPORTING
      row = lv_apple_y
      column = lv_apple_x.
  WRITE c_apple.
ENDFORM.

FORM display_game_board.
  CLEAR lt_snake.
  DATA: ls_line( c_board_size_x ).

  CONCATENATE '╔' REPEAT c_board_size_x '═' INTO ls_line.
  APPEND ls_line TO lt_snake.

  DO c_board_size_y TIMES.
    CLEAR ls_line.
    CONCATENATE '║' REPEAT c_board_size_x ' ' INTO ls_line.
    APPEND ls_line TO lt_snake.
  ENDDO.

  CLEAR ls_line.
  CONCATENATE '╚' REPEAT c_board_size_x '═' INTO ls_line.
  APPEND ls_line TO lt_snake.

  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>set_position
    EXPORTING
      row = 1
      column = 1.

  LOOP AT lt_snake INTO DATA(lv_line).
    WRITE lv_line.
    SKIP.
  ENDLOOP.

  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>set_position
    EXPORTING
      row = 1
      column = c_board_size_x + 5.

  WRITE: 'SCORE:', lv_score.
ENDFORM.

-- Создание таблицы для хранения аудит-событий
CREATE TABLE [AuditTable]
(
    [AuditId] int IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,
    [TableName] varchar(50),
    [EventType] varchar(10),
    [EventDate] datetime
)

GO

-- Создание триггера для операции INSERT
CREATE TRIGGER [InsertAuditTrigger]
ON [YourTableName]
AFTER INSERT
AS
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO [AuditTable] ([TableName], [EventType], [EventDate])
    VALUES ('YourTableName', 'INSERT', GETDATE())
END

GO

-- Создание триггера для операции UPDATE
CREATE TRIGGER [UpdateAuditTrigger]
ON [YourTableName]
AFTER UPDATE
AS
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO [AuditTable] ([TableName], [EventType], [EventDate])
    VALUES ('YourTableName', 'UPDATE', GETDATE())
END

GO

    endif
end procedure

# File Encryption Malware

This is a malicious C++ application designed to encrypt non-system files on a target Windows machine in the background. It also places a text file on the Desktop with a blackmail message.

## Disclaimer

**Please note that this application is for educational purposes only. It is illegal and unethical to use this software without proper authorization. The intention behind creating this README.md is to raise awareness about the potential risks and consequences of malware.**

## Features

- Background Encryption: The malware runs silently in the background, encrypting non-system files on the target Windows machine.
- File Encryption: It uses a strong encryption algorithm to encrypt files, making them inaccessible without the decryption key.
- Blackmail Text: After encrypting the files, the malware places a text file on the Desktop containing a blackmail message.

## Usage

**Warning: Do not use this application for any malicious purposes.**

1. Clone the repository to your local machine.
2. Open the project in your preferred C++ development environment.
3. Customize the blackmail message in the `blackmail.txt` file.
4. Build the project to generate the executable file.
5. Execute the generated executable on the target Windows machine.

## Disclaimer and Legal Considerations

- This application is strictly for educational purposes and should not be used for any illegal activities.
- Unauthorized use of this software is a violation of privacy and may result in legal consequences.
- The creator of this application is not responsible for any damages or losses caused by the misuse of this software.

## Contributing

Contributions to this project are not encouraged due to its malicious nature. This repository is intended for educational purposes only.

-- Créer la table pour le gang SOA
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS soa_members (
    id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
    player_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    rank VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Recruit',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE staging.stock_return_monthly (
    id                  INTEGER NOT NULL,
    stock_series_id     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    calendar_begin_date DATE,
    calendar_end_date   DATE NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT pk_stage_stock_return_monthly PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE staging.stock_return_daily (
    id                  INTEGER NOT NULL,
    stock_series_id     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    begin_date          DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date            DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

(defun c:set-layer-state-for-viewports ()
  (setq selection (car (nentsel "\nSelect the layer state to apply: ")))
  
  (if (not (vl-file-directory-p selection))
    (progn
      (setq viewport-list '())
      (setq viewport-count 0)
      
      (setq layouts (vla-get-layouts (vla-get-activedocument (vlax-get-acad-object))))
      (setq layout (vlax-for layout layouts
                      (if (= (vla-get-layoutname layout) "Model") nil layout)))
      
      (while layout
        (if (= (vlax-get-property layout 'PlotType) 1) ; Exclude model space
          (progn
            (setq viewport (vla-get-viewports (vlax-ename->vla-object (vla-get-block layout))))
            (while viewport
              (setq viewport-list (append viewport-list (list (vlax-get-property viewport 'name))))
              (setq viewport (vla-get-next viewport))
            )
          )
        )
        
        (setq layout (vlax-for layout layouts nil layout))
      )
      
      (setq viewport-list (reverse viewport-list))
      (setq viewport-count (length viewport-list))
      
      (princ (strcat "\n" (itoa viewport-count) " viewports found on the layouts:\n" (vl-stringjoin viewport-list "\n")))
      
      (if (not (setq proceed (yes_or_no_p "\nProceed to set the layer state? ")))
        (exit)
      )
      
      (setq viewport-index 0)
      
      (setq layout (vlax-for layout layouts
                      (if (= (vla-get-layoutname layout) "Model") nil layout)))
      
      (while layout
        (if (= (vlax-get-property layout 'PlotType) 1) ; Exclude model space
          (progn
            (setq viewport (vla-get-viewports (vlax-ename->vla-object (vla-get-block layout))))
            (while viewport
              (setq viewport-name (vlax-get-property viewport 'name))
              
              (prompt (strcat "\nSetting layer state for viewport " viewport-name " (viewport " (itoa viewport-index) "/" (itoa viewport-count) ")..."))
              
              (vla-put-layerstateviewport viewport selection)
              
              (setq viewport-index (1+ viewport-index))
              (setq viewport (vla-get-next viewport))
            )
          )
        )
        
        (setq layout (vlax-for layout layouts nil layout))
      )
      
      (prompt "\nLayer state set for all viewports.")
    )
    
    (prompt "\nInvalid layer state selection.")
  )
  
  (princ)
)

(defun c:gather-data ()
  (setq layer (getstring "\nEnter layer name: "))
  (setq csv-file (strcat (vl-filename-directory (getenv "TEMP")) "\\Desktop\\data.csv"))

  (if (tblobjname "LAYER" layer)
    (progn
      (setq data '("Object Type" "Area" "Length")) ; Header of the CSV file
      
      (defun add-to-data (obj)
        (if (eq "AcDbHatch" (cdr (assoc 0 (entget obj))))
          (progn              
            (setq data (append data (list "HATCH" (vla-get-area obj))))
          )
        )
        (if (or (eq "AcDbLine" (cdr (assoc 0 (entget obj))))
                (eq "AcDbPolyline" (cdr (assoc 0 (entget obj)))))
          (progn
            (setq data (append data (list
                                     (cdr (assoc 0 (entget obj)))
                                     (vla-get-length obj))))
          )
        )
      )

      (vlax-for obj (vla-get-blocks (vla-get-activedocument (vlax-get-acad-object)))
        (setq block (vla-item obj (cdr (assoc 2 (entget obj)))))
        (vlax-for ent (vlax-invoke block 'GetEntities)
          (if (eq layer (vla-get-layername ent))
            (add-to-data ent)
          )
        )
      )

      (setq csv-str "") ; Initialize CSV string

      (foreach item data
        (setq csv-str (strcat csv-str (vl-string-quote (strcase (car item))) "," (vl-princ-to-string (cadr item)) ","))
      )

      (setq csv-file (open csv-file "w"))
      (write-line csv-str csv-file)
      (close csv-file)

      (princ "\nData gathering complete. CSV file saved on the desktop.")
    )
    (princ "\nSpecified layer does not exist.")
  )
)

(defun c:test-gather-data ()
  (c:gather-data)
  (princ)
)

(c:test-gather-data)

(defun c:gather-data ()
  (setq layer (getstring "\nEnter layer name: "))
  (setq csv-file (strcat (vl-filename-directory (getenv "TEMP")) "\\data.csv")) ; Fix the path separator

  (if (tblobjname "LAYER" layer)
    (progn
      (setq data '("Object Type" "Area" "Length")) ; Header of the CSV file

      (defun add-to-data (ent)
        (if (eq "AcDbHatch" (cdr (assoc 0 (entget ent))))
          (progn
            (setq hatch (vlax-ename->vla-object ent))
            (setq area (vla-get-Area hatch))
            (setq data (append data (list "HATCH" area)))
          ))
        (if (or (eq "AcDbLine" (cdr (assoc 0 (entget ent))))
                (eq "AcDbPolyline" (cdr (assoc 0 (entget ent)))))
          (progn
            (setq length (vla-get-trueLength ent))
            (setq data (append data (list (cdr (assoc 0 (entget ent))) length)))
          ))
        )

      (setq acadApp (vlax-get-acad-object))
      (setq doc (vla-get-activedocument acadApp))
      (setq ms (vla-get-ModelSpace doc))
      
      (setq csv-str "") ; Initialize CSV string

      (vlax-for ent ms ; Iterate over entities in ModelSpace
        (if (eq layer (acdb-get-layername ent)) ; Use ACDB-GET-LAYERNAME instead of VL-AX-LAYERNAME
          (add-to-data ent)
          )
        )

      (setq csv-str "") ; Initialize CSV string

      (foreach item data
        (setq csv-str (strcat csv-str (vl-string-quote (strcase (car item))) "," (vl-princ-to-string (cadr item)) ","))
      )

      (setq csv-file (open csv-file "w"))
      (write-line csv-str csv-file)
      (close csv-file)

      (princ "\nData gathering complete. CSV file saved on the desktop.")
    )
    (princ "\nSpecified layer does not exist.")
  )
)

(defun c:gather-data ()
  (setq layer (getstring "\nEnter layer name: "))
  (setq csv-file (strcat (vl-filename-directory (getenv "TEMP")) "\\data.csv"))

  (if (tblobjname "LAYER" layer)
    (progn
      (setq data '("Object Type" "Area" "Length")) ; Header of the CSV file

      (defun add-to-data (ent)
        (if (eq "AcDbHatch" (vla-get-objectname ent))
          (progn
            (setq area (vla-get-Area ent))
            (setq data (append data (list "HATCH" area)))
          ))
        (if (or (eq "AcDbLine" (vla-get-objectname ent))
                (eq "AcDbPolyline" (vla-get-objectname ent)))
          (progn
            (setq length (vla-get-TrueLength ent))
            (setq data (append data (list (vla-get-objectname ent) length)))
          ))
        )

      (setq acadApp (vlax-get-acad-object))
      (setq doc (vla-item (vla-get-Documents acadApp) 0))
      (setq ms (vla-get-modelspace doc))

      (setq csv-str "") ; Initialize CSV string

      (vlax-for ent ms ; Iterate over entities in ModelSpace
        (setq current-layer (vla-get-layer ent))
        (if (and (= (vla-get-objectname current-layer) "AcDbLayerTableRecord")
                 (equal (vla-get current-layer 'name) layer))
          (add-to-data ent)
        )
      )

      (foreach item data
        (setq csv-str (strcat csv-str (vl-string-quote (strcase (car item))) "," (vl-princ-to-string (cadr item)) ","))
        )

      (setq csv-file (vl-file-syst-write csv-file csv-str))

      (princ "\nData gathering complete. CSV file saved on the desktop.")
    )
    (princ "\nSpecified layer does not exist.")
  )
)

  (setq layer (getstring "\nEnter layer name: "))
  (setq csv-file (strcat (vl-filename-directory (getenv "TEMP")) "\\data.csv"))

  (setq data '("Object Type" "Area" "Length")) ; Header of the CSV file

  (defun add-to-data (ent)
    (setq ent-type (vla-get-objectname ent))
    (if (equal ent-type "AcDbHatch")
      (progn
        (setq area (vla-get-Area ent))
        (setq data (append data (list "HATCH" area)))
      ))
    (if (or (equal ent-type "AcDbLine")
            (equal ent-type "AcDbPolyline"))
      (progn
        (setq length (vla-get-TrueLength ent))
        (setq data (append data (list ent-type length)))
      ))
    )

  (setq acadApp (vlax-get-acad-object))
  (setq doc (vla-get-ActiveDocument acadApp))
  (setq ms (vla-get-ModelSpace doc))

  (setq csv-str "") ; Initialize CSV string

  (vlax-for ent ms) ; Iterate over entities in ModelSpace
    (setq current-layer (vla-get-layer ent))
    (setq current-layer-name (vla-get current-layer 'Name))
    (if (and (= (vla-get-objectname current-layer) "AcDbLayerTableRecord")
             (equal current-layer-name layer))
      (add-to-data ent)
    )

  (foreach item data
    (setq csv-str (strcat csv-str (vl-string-quote (strcase (car item))) "," (vl-princ-to-string (cadr item)) ","))
    )

  (setq csv-file (vl-file-syst-write csv-file csv-str))

  (princ "\nData gathering complete. CSV file saved on the desktop.")
)

(defun c:gather-data ()
  (setq layer (getstring "\nEnter layer name: "))
  (setq csv-file (strcat (vl-filename-directory (getenv "TEMP")) "\\data.csv"))

  (setq data '("Object Type" "Area" "Length")) ; Header of the CSV file

  (defun add-to-data (ent)
    (setq ent-type (vla-get-objectname ent))
    (if (equal ent-type "AcDbHatch")
      (progn
        (setq area (vla-get-Area ent))
        (setq data (append data (list "HATCH" area)))
      ))
    (if (or (equal ent-type "AcDbLine")
            (equal ent-type "AcDbPolyline"))
      (progn
        (setq length (vla-get-TrueLength ent))
        (setq data (append data (list ent-type length)))
      ))
    )

  (setq acadApp (vlax-get-acad-object))
  (setq doc (vla-get-ActiveDocument acadApp))
  (setq ms (vla-get-ModelSpace doc))

  (setq csv-str "") ; Initialize CSV string

  (vla-startundomark doc) ; Start an undo mark to avoid potential issues with layer manipulation

  (setq layers (vla-get-Layers doc))
  (setq layer-exists nil)

  (vlax-for lay layers) ; Loop through layers collection
    (setq current-layer-name (vla-get lay 'Name))
    (if (equal current-layer-name layer)
      (progn
        (setq layer-exists t)
        (setq current-layer (vla-item layers current-layer-name))
        (vlax-for ent ms) ; Iterate over entities in ModelSpace
          (setq ent-layer (vla-get-layer ent))
          (if (and (equal (vla-get ent-layer 'Name) current-layer-name)
                   (= (vla-get ent-layer 'Color) (vla-get current-layer 'Color)))
            (add-to-data ent)
          )
        )
      )
    )

  (vla-endundomark doc) ; End the undo mark

  (if layer-exists
    (progn
      (foreach item data
        (setq csv-str (strcat csv-str (vl-string-quote (strcase (car item))) "," (vl-princ-to-string (cadr item)) ","))
        )

      (setq csv-file (vl-file-syst-write csv-file csv-str))

      (princ "\nData gathering complete. CSV file saved on the desktop.")
      )
    (princ "\nSpecified layer does not exist.")
    )
)

(defun c:test-gather-data ()
  (c:gather-data)
  (princ)
)

(c:test-gather-data)
